story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1101_0100_20: On the day of the Arceus Cup...
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I can’t believe we extended an invitation to
him, of all people.
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1001_0400_10:
A lot, actually. Blue’s heard my complaints
already.
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1001_0500_10: But we’ve come this far, I suppose.
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1001_0600_10:
It’s time to start another Arceus Cup!
Show us your bonds!
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1001_0800_10: We’ll give you a taste of our power!
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1001_0900_10: Hmph. Let’s see what you can do.
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1101_1000_20:
The fight is on! Neither side is yielding a
single inch!
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Blue told us not to get involved, but do you
think he’s gonna be OK?
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1001_1200_10: Giovanni IS pretty strong, after all.
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1001_1300_10: It certainly won’t be easy—that’s for sure.
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1101_1400_20:
It’s a double knockout! This could still be
anyone’s match!
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1001_1600_10: Oh, wow! What a great battle!
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Giovanni actually is a strong Trainer in his
own right.
story_arceus_07_08000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I hate to admit it, but his bonds of evil are
also quite strong...
